website_summaries.verdict: Fingerprint-activated, battery-run safe with the added benefits of portability and quick access. Owners are highly satisfied.
pros: LED lighting helps you see safe in low light
Backup key (manual) is available in case of power failure or other unforeseen circumstance
cons: It is not waterproof or fireproof

customer_reviews.title: I have shut this thing like 30 times and it just keeps popping open
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this thing, please so your research before spending this type of money on a safe. It does not shut and lock. I have shut this thing like 30 times and it just keeps popping open. I have looked on google and it seems that this is a common thing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Blue77eyez

customer_reviews.title: Great options, updated security features, long battery life,easy setup, interior light
customer_reviews.text: Great safe and easy to set up. I like that it has adult rechargeable battery (battery and cable included), long battery life (standby up to 6 months), easy setup, multiple ways to enter safe (should one method fail), BLUETOOTH (yeah, there's an App for that!), and updated safety features. Presentation/boxing alone was impressive and Vaultek customer service reached out to ensure my satisfaction a couple days after I received it. Buying another for the upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C. DePriest

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: finger print opening doesn’ t work.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and very sturdy. It is Well designed and looks great. How does it work? Well, not so well. When I tried to program the finger print to open the safe, it seems to accept the finger print. It will not open. Clear and reprogram. The result is the same. Tied with all fingers to no change. Tried big toe with the same result. I went to the website and guess what, the programming instructions are different. I followed the new instructions with the same result. I then called tech support , but they were too busy to take my call. They have not returned my call.
customer_reviews.author: FXSpringer01

customer_reviews.title: Received a used product at “new” price.
customer_reviews.text: Used product shipped. Very disappointed to pay this kind of money and receive a used product. Verified by access log on history on app.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Heller

customer_reviews.title: Has some issues.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the numeric combination maybe 4 times in the last year to open the safe yet the paint on the keys is cracking and peeling off. The #4 is no longer legible. The app has a “History Log” that seems to randomly erase itself and doesn’t even log failed attempts to acces the safe when it does show activity. Have the security issues of being able to unlock it without a valid code and not encrypting traffic been fixed? The app change log mentions “bug fixes” but no security fixes. And no update for the physical safe.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Well they took the whole safe... Good thing I don't leave my gun in it overnight.
customer_reviews.text: Up to this point I have had no issues with the product, however I have always wished it could be bolted to the truck frame. Right now its secured to the seat frame itself, and hidden under some blankets, so it is not visible. However some punk broke into my truck yesterday, and it seems to have taken him all of 3 minutes to pull the safe off the cable and run with it... See pics.. I thought it would be a bit harder than t his to steal....
customer_reviews.author: Chad House

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe, but not biometric
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint scanner is garbage. It unlocks perhaps one time in twenty-five, if I'm lucky. Other than that it's a good safe; nice heavy sixteen-gauge steel, positive keypad, and so on. But to market it as a "biometric" safe is misleading, because the fingerprint feature is essentially useless. Update 11/27/2017 - I dropped the safe onto carpet from a height of 24" this afternoon, and it popped open. I had seen videos of people trying to pry it open with various tools, and it appeared difficult to open, but I concur with other reviewers to the effect that this safe is NOT secure.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Just short of exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safe! Enough space to put both handguns and an extra mag each. It has a code unlock, finger print, key and Bluetooth via phone app. Continent. 2 issues I have. The finger print is finicky. It take 2 or 3 tries to get it to unlock and I use my thumb. Second, there is no extremely quick way to get into the safe. If I need it in the middle of the night, I don't have a lot of time to enter a code or try my finger print 3 times. I sure don't have enough time to find the key or unlock my phone and open the app.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Furman

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the Biometric feature
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I think it is well built. I have heard that children can get in this if their finger prints are similar to their parents. I have this sitting on the counter, not yet in use and we were discussing this among ourselves when my granddaughter, who is not biologically related to us, placed her finger on the biometric reader and it popped open. Of course well all gasped and looked at each other. I thought that maybe this was a one time fluke and had her do it again, and guess what? Yep, it opened a second time. Guess this feature will be disabled.
customer_reviews.author: Roze

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy a non-biometric model. Difficult to program the biometric feature. It took 30-40 minutes to finally register my finger print. I won’t trust it when my life is on the line. Use keypad or key when it counts. The biometric is very inconsistent! Furthermore, the “app” is a joke! It only works with Bluetooth. So if you are home and someone moves your safe, you will no. Otherwise, once you leave home, the app is useless. The app let’s you adjust the inside led light.Woopy-do! Overall, love the quality, storage capacity, will keep your gun safe against accidental drop, and feels solid. Hate the biometric feature and app. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sasan Nikoomanesh

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable enough for defense weapon
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my copy had some issues but not only did the thumbs/finger print only work 30% of the time (yes I reprogrammed them several times) but the numeric keypad chokes on inputs half the time as well. Not something I want to be fighting with when trying to get a pistol out. I wanted to like it as fit and finish is excellent with tons of cool features. Sent back and replaced with a simplex Fort Knox safe which I'm very pleased with. I'll applaud Vaultek on their innovation in the market, but it's not reliable enough yet for a defense weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy set-up. I particularly like that you can open the safe in one of four ways: fingerprint, self programed code, blue tooth app, and by key. Having practiced quick opening the safe, the numeric code appears fastest. Safe easily fits my Glock 17 9mm with an extra clip. When open there is a bight interior LED light that shines within the safe. The safe comes with a cable and screws for mounting on a flat surface. Glad I purchased, great peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: mark johnson

customer_reviews.title: I looked at all of the safes in this class before deciding on this one and I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my handgun safely away from my children, but still be accessible quickly when I need it. I looked at all of the safes in this class before deciding on this one and I am glad I did. This has surpassed all of my expectations. It's fast, easy to use, works with my cell phone and it is very sturdy. The manufacturer has also been great to work with. When a security flaw was discovered, they responded with a fix very quickly, sent me the parts required to solve the problem, and sent me $25. That is A++ customer service. I would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid safe with great features
customer_reviews.text: This handgun safe has everything you could ask for in a small safe. It's light and small enough to be portable, yet solid enough that it would take some time to get into if you shouldn't have access. My favorite feature if the fingerprint reader. It's easy to program your fingerprint and it can store two prints. Once stored, all you have to do is put your finger on the pad and the door literally flies open. There is even a little light inside so you can see what you're doing in the dark. I don't know much about gun safes, but I sure like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy's Tropical Garden

customer_reviews.title: Received a used safe missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Product seems ok, but pretty disappointing that I received a clearly used item missing all the components (like the back up key, battery, etc..) leaving me no way to open it / set a code. I'm sure I can return this for a refund, but not sure I'll buy another since this experience does not inspire confidence in quality control if this is what I was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Safe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe in advance of getting my first handgun - so that when I DO get the gun - I have a secure place to lock it. It's very well made, solid and expensive looking. I got the fingerprint reader to work on my first attempt to program it. Occasionally the reader doesn't work on my first attempt at a fingerprint read to open it. I can certainly fix that by re-programming the reader, but it is not a big deal - as it always opens. Plus, there is the backup of the numerical code.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morano

customer_reviews.title: The biometric finger scanner is absolutely junk. Even when ...
customer_reviews.text: The biometric finger scanner is absolutely junk. Even when doing as suggested and scanning one finger multiple times it would work less than 5% of the time. After trying to open the safe with your finger you would then have to wait 10-20 seconds for it to reset before you could use the keypad...I'm giving this safe a one star rating only because I can't give it a zero.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J Michalet

customer_reviews.title: Vaultek HG biometric VT20I
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product by Vaultek I like the security features on this product If you take the time to read manual this can be done by putting in your own code and uses fingerprints to open the unit you can also open this with the app also this model keeps track of your history when you open the unit and the best feature is that if someone tampers with the unit it will send you an alert through the app This unit is well built and does come with keys recommend VT20I Biometric HG case I recommend this product also recommend that you also get the app through the App Store
customer_reviews.author: FREDERICK D. SELLITTI

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS SAFE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I WOKE UP THIS MORNING AND MY SAFE DOOR MAGICALLY OPENED ON ITS OWN WITHOUT ANYONE TOUCHING IT. I EMAILED THE VAULTEK CUSTOMER SUPPORT AND THIS WAS THEIR RESPONSE "When closing the VT20i, we recommend a slow deliberate force on the center of the lid, until you feel and hear the locking mechanisms engage. We have replicated false closings in the past by throwing, or slamming the lid down. The lid and safe body will appear closed through binding, but the locking mechanisms have not engaged. Then later, with a bump or vibration the lid pops open." THIS ITEM IS DEFECTIVE AND SHOULD IMMEDIATELY BE PULLED OFF OF ALL WEBSITES!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin K

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cat bed (oh and the safe is awesone)
customer_reviews.text: only recently received the safe but giving it 5 stars so far. Mainly because the biometric aspect was easy to set up and has been very consistent to open. No issues with it and that was my biggest concern in spending the money. As you can see when empty it doubles as an excellent cat bed. LOL. The item has a very Sleek design and the packaging looks like you're buying a new Macbook, really great marketing. They do a great job of making it feel like you've bought a new toy. On the more important side we bought this to keep kids out and it feels very sturdy, stable, code works perfectly and I believe it's worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: CatLover704

customer_reviews.title: Very loud when opening.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is very nice. The packaging and instructions are also very nice. The fault that i have, and it's pretty big for a product that will be used by my bed to hold a gun in case of an intruder, is that it is VERY loud when it opens. There is no stealth to this safe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Corey B.

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this safe but the price just could not be justified. It was a very solid, heavy, well-built safe and the fingerprint reader worked every time I used it. I just could not justify the price. If it had RFID as well, it would have been a knock out for sure. Just having that extra flexibility of anothe way to get into it would have been nice. I liked the way the lid opened up wider than the Hornady RapidSafe I ended up keeping and I liked how it opened on the long side vs the short side like the Hornady. Again....the price was the negative here.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quick access safe.....no regrets!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe. Holds a glock 17 with a light and an extra mag easily. Also fits a glock 43, extra mag and a Sig p365 and extra mag. It works extremely well, great battery life (plug mine in every 8-12 months), the interior light is amazing, everything about it is very well thought out. I will buy more Vaultek products! I have no issues with the lid locking etc like other reviews have said. Battery lasts for many months. The app is great to check out battery level. This is worth every penny. I am going to order another one.....outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frame

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint scanner.... Really??
customer_reviews.text: I have this model and the slider. The slider fingerprint scanner is ok ...works most of the time, but I would certainly not rely on it in a real emergent situation. As for this unit I was nearly able to get my fingerprint registered, but since then ....no go. Very dissapointed with the safe, particularly for the price. I'm going to try some others and with luck, this one and the slider will be going back. If you are looking for a reliable fingerprint scanner, do yourself a favor and look elsewhere, it will save you some time.
customer_reviews.author: joe g.

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the sentrysafe 2 gun with interior light safe. Let’s just say I had to return it two different times. So I asked around and a lot of people told me this brand is the best. The safe I got off amazon was 40$ cheaper then the one on their site so I ordered it here. So inside I have a .380 ruger and a 26 series glock along with two extra magazines. Set up was super easy and so was the app. Definitely should have bought this one to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Adult entertainer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny it costs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for reliable handgun storage. Here are my considerations: 1.Easy access in case it needed 2. Multiple access options 3. SW application for setup and management Vaultek fits all the requirements. I like the fact that app contains history log and battery status information. Tip: Add same finger ID twice to improve readability.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on the finger print reader.
customer_reviews.text: The finger print reader works 4 times out of five but that is not good enough for a gun safe that is supposed to be readily accessible. The keypad is slow. You can press the buttons faster than this thing will be able to handle and you will have to re-enter them again to open it. Also not great for a gun safe. Sturdy build quality.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy access when needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Heavy duty construction. Larger inside than expected. Easily holds hand pistol and two magazines. Light inside makes seeing contents easy. Easy set up of fingerprints and code. Includes key entry. Inside has thick padding. Includes a charging cord to keep battery charged. I am delighted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: BIOMETRICS DO NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: BIOMETRICS DO NOT WORK! DO NOT BUY THIS VERSION - save $ and get the next step down. The safe is well built and solid and works great using the key punch pad. And I was able to program in multiple fingerprints - all worked well the first week. Then they all stopped working. NO biometric access at all until you reprogram it. Don't waste $ as the biometrics aren't ready for prime time and you certainly don't want to use them in a life and death situation. The key pad works fine so go with that. Good safe except for price hike due to biometrics that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Good safe
customer_reviews.text: This has worked pretty well for me so far. The fingerprint reader can be a little finicky at times but still works well enough for me to be confident. Was easy to program. The App is fine but I dont use it much. I went two months without charging it and it was still fine. I just charged it for the first time but it still seemed to have plenty of charge when I did it. The biggest drawback is price.
customer_reviews.author: M1A1CMDR

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reliability
customer_reviews.text: Just received the safe but all the features were easy to program and the fingerprint option has worked 30 times out of 30 attempts so far. It is great for extra security in your car better than just leaving a gun in your trunk. The app doesn’t do much except tell you battery strength but it would be nice if you could input your number combination on your phone and have it open the safe. It is very solid and the workmanship is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Bcutty

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on tranny hump of an 05 GMC 2500 HD. Installed with usb charging chord under carpet up to behind dash to a usb charging port I installed. Fully charged all the time. The push button keys light up automatically any time your hand gets near the keys, great for day or night. Phone app works most of the time. Finger print reader leaves something to be desired but usually works in 4-5 swipes. I have found that the key code is just as fast as the biometrics and works every time.
customer_reviews.author: jem

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! All the features such as fingerprint, combination, smartphone worked great so far. However, it is very small and too expensive for its size . I would love to buy more of this safe but I doubt I will due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: MD Buyer

customer_reviews.title: VAULTEK VT20i Delivers On Promise. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Had very high expectations for this safe based on previous reviews. Delighted to say the VT20i met and exceeded all!!! It's quick setup instructions were spot on. I used my index finger for the scanner and due to its need for precision, it took a few attempts until is was perfectly scanned. That said, once programmed, the VT20i opened immediately using both the numerical and scanner methods. Programming my iPHONE 7 using the downloadable app could not be easier. It easily holds my Glock 30, an extra clip and misc other items. Highly recommend you leave it charging overnight to insure the battery is fully charged. In case you haven't realized it... I highly recommend this safe!
customer_reviews.author: RJARDEN

customer_reviews.title: Quality Quick Access Safe
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality and size of the product. I have been using quick access handgun safes for almost 20 years. This is my first safe with biometric fingerprint entry. It works well. It also has key entry and numeric touchpad entry. Lots of options depending on your preference. I have room for a full size Beretta 96, extra mag and a small wallet in my safe. It also works with my smart phone for opening, battery status and more. The only thing that was not completely clear was how to secure the smart phone app with pattern locks. I went to the Valuteksafe.com site and this was easily explained. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: C. N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this safe, but the fingerprint scanner is terrible. If i need to get inside of it in an emergency, it could cost me my life! I forgot to mention that the app is absolutely pointless.
customer_reviews.author: T Dixon

customer_reviews.title: This Gun Safe is Awesome! It is Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This Gun Safe is Awesome! It is Strong and sturdy. It has 4 easy was to open it up. 1. Key 2. Finger Print Scanner ( and it works Perfectly). 3. you own 5 pin key Code and 4. Use the downloadable phone app. The App is really simple to use and set a link the dots passcode. It will open you save and can also manage your Finger print scans and give them an Owner or Name. This is the best travel gun safe I have ever had. You can even use it for home quick access safe in your home. Well worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A.

customer_reviews.title: Want quality? Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Product just screams quality, I was hesitant on purchasing this model as opposed to a non biometric one but glad I went with the VT20i. Nice and solid build, super heavy and just overall a nice handgun safe that can be left out in the open and it won’t be a eye sore. Finger print scanner sometimes can be finicky but once you know where to place your finger it opens every time. Fits full size handguns with 2 spare magazines; I can fit my Glock 21SF with 2 magazines with no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis orozco

customer_reviews.title: Vaultek VT20i Biometric - Great at sales, poor at service
customer_reviews.text: Usually do not complain over honest mistakes, however, not happy with overall product/service. Unit failed to both recognize my fingerprint data accurately after several attempts, then completely went on the blink when trying to soft re-boot and erase fingerprints that were not recognized. Tried to call tech support and would not answer call. Finally responded to email and after three attempts to soft re-boot was forced to return safe. Over a week later, received same unit back with NO BATTERY. Forced to buy a new battery and try from scratch almost 3 weeks later. Good product idea, bad execution and support overall.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hemsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. ... Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: This is so rear nowdays when you buy something and you are 100% satisfied. Really worth the money I paid for it. Fingerprints work 100%, solid, very well packed and looks secure. Thank you for you product, keep going. Update: Out of nowhere fingerprints stopped working good. The success rate is 2-3 out of 10. I didn't scratch or damage the sensor. One year passed and no warranty. I doubt I buy the product again
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: Storing a handgun? This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. I keep one in each vehicle in order to keep my valuables and handguns out of the hands of thieves. They work remarkably well. I use the fingerprint scanner to gain access to the safe almost exclusively. Occasionally my finger may fail to open the safe either because I have the wrong area of my finger placed on the scanner or a foreign substance gives a false reading. If that happens the combination number that is self-programmed accomplishes the opening of the safe quickly and easily. I highly recommend these as a very high quality safe from packaging to every detail, truly a well engineered product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tully

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome. Customizable. Works like a charm. Was really impressed with consistency and speed of the biometric fingerprint reader. Holds a charge for a really long time. Inside light is great (also customizable). App is a nice feature. Not "huge" so can't store a ton but a couple pieces at least and maybe a few clips? Overall exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: WayBack Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Great safe! Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe and it was working flawlessly. 5 months later, the lid stopped popping up. I contacted Vaultek and the guys were AWESOME! Told me to send it back to them, got it fixed and they sent it back. Did not cost me a penny. These guys back up their products. No questions asked or arguing.. Been working awesome ever since! Love the safe! No more issues and works as described! My next purchase will be the bigger size safe. Vaultek all the way! A++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have got the full size
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong. I really do like this Smart Safe. I wish it was just a tiny bit bigger though. It fits my Springfield XD(m) 3.8 Compact perfectly, as long as I have the flush magazine in the gun. However, it does not fit with an extended magazine inserted. I wish I would have just got the full size safe instead. Make sure to take your time setting up the fingerprint reader and follow the instructions. I open the safe multiple times a day and every once and a while it won't recognize my finger, but at the same token it does it just as much as my Samsung Galaxy S10 phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice features
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a 9 mm and a few magazines. The fingerprint reader isn't that good though. It does allow you to put in a bunch of prints, but I'd be worried about it in an emergency. However it also allows you to put in a 4 number pin. So most of the time I just use that. Some good features are size, cable, screws, and app to track history and battery. I screwed it down to my end table and it's cabled (comes with cable) to my bed post. All in all I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it so far. Fingerprint scanner works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s great! Before this, I bought the SentrySafe similar to this one and it was HORRIBLE. It malfunctioned straight out of the box. I sent it back and spent a little more on this and it was WELL worth it for one that actually works. Easy to use and works every time so far. Has a nice heavy feel too it and a smooth auto open. The fingerprint works for me every time.
customer_reviews.author: Adepino

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: Got this to safely store my handgun. The security options are great - fingerprint, code, and app. Safe is very secure with lots of anti-tampering features. I like the compact size and weight (but still hefty and strong). Fits very discreetly in my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Konfrst

customer_reviews.title: ... safes before settling on this one and I'm definitely glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several gun safes before settling on this one and I'm definitely glad I did. This safe is expensive but I'd say it's worth it for sure; it's very high quality and works like a charm. I've tried all the different ways to open it over and over and it's never failed once. Has a light inside which is nice too. The only vague downside is it's a little on the small side but it will fit one full size pistol easily and you could put 2 compacts in there I would imagine. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Great product that gives peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: We love this safe. We did get the upgraded model that is a bit more secure. We are able to fit our two 9mms in the safe at once. We got it for the quick access and security during travel. The one thing we've noticed is that the fingerprint lock sometimes needs to be done twice to open. The secure keypad next to the fingerprint id is a good back up and the app is cool. We are very glad we purchased this safe and have piece of mind that the kids aren't going to access our firearms.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Very well built..
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this safe. The fingerprint reader was upgraded apparently, and is much more reliable that others have stated. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Risinger

customer_reviews.title: disppointed
customer_reviews.text: Receiving the safe with high expectation, but so disappointed with the quality. The fingerprint scanner barely functioned. Also, the safe is unable to lock tightly
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: Buy a cheaper vault
customer_reviews.text: Although the fingerprint reader may seem to be a handy addition, it's not. The finger has to be placed just right, under stress I might add, or it doesn't work. Under stress, placing your finger correctly the first time is virtually impossible. Forget the biometrics and the feelgood phone aps as well. Stick with the numbered keypad and keyed lock. As with any gun vault such as this I can break into it in 10 minutes with an angle grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money.. Finger print scanner much more sensitive..
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth app works as advertised except for the battery percentage. Even after charging for hours only says 88%. The finger print scanner works much better than most I have seen on the market. It does cause more refusals due to sensitivity. Finger placement is particular. I prefer the higher sensitivity for safety reasons. This model always offers the ability to open with number code as a back-up if necessary in emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a Sig Sauer P226
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as advertised. The bluetooth feature is useful if you want to see the access log and or change the light brightness. The safe is well built and keeps the curious out which is the primary purpose of this safe. There was enough room for a full size Sig P226 and two clips and there was some space for some ammo storage. The fingerprint reader is iffy at times but I expected that. This is a nice safe to use within a night stand drawer provided you have a big enough drawer to hold the safe.
customer_reviews.author: steve m lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Safe and fast access!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could secure my sidearm whenever I do not have it on, or when I must enter a place where firearms are not allowed. I love the fact that you can secure the anti-theft cable in your vehicle and it takes just a second to attach the safe to it if I need to leave my firearm in the vehicle. It is TSA approved, so that's a plus. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Board

customer_reviews.title: Weak Biometrics reader
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the sage looks but I’m very disappointed with the biometric finger print reader. It fails 60% of the time and I’m not betting my family’s life on that. I’m tired of spending money on items that don’t work the way they’re suppose too. I returned it and ordered another safe from a tried and true safe company.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Santayana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect the biometric reader to work all the time
customer_reviews.text: This safe is nice and heavy duty, but the biometric reader works maybe 10%of the time. I bought this safe for this feature. I can’t stake my life or family’s on something that isn’t reliable so I returned it. I’ll try another brand and see if it’s any better. Solid construction though, and the keypad works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, except for the fingerprint reader.
customer_reviews.text: I've used other fingerprint readers on my iPhone, MacBook, and ThinkPad, and they're all reliable, they work 98% on the first try. On the Vaultek safe, I've followed the directions carefully, tried multiple fingers multiple times, and it works about 1 time out of 10, at best. If you were depending upon this so that you could stop a bad guy with a gun, you would die.
customer_reviews.author: charles murphy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little vault!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect home vault, fingerprint reader doesn't work consistently, but if you can't punch in a code quickly then that's on you! Extremely solid and heavy feel to it, good build quality. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic safe
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe. Exceptional in terms of materials and protecting your guns/valuables. Minus 1 star because the biometric scanner only works about 75% of the time. I've registered the same fingerprint multiple times, per the instructions. I would definitely buy this safe again though, even knowing the biometric scanner isn't perfect. Just make sure you know your pass code...and practice opening it that way. Practice makes perfect. I would give this safe 4.9 stars if I could. It is an exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Don't bet your life.........
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized case. Holds a full sized 1911, spare mag and a flashlight. But the fingerprint reader is no better than far less expensive safes. Often takes several attempts to get the safe to open. Sometimes you have to resort to the keypad and sometimes that fails as well. Bought this for a location that I needed quick, reliable access. Will have to retire it to someplace less critical.
customer_reviews.author: no more Rain-X

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Glock 19 and my Glock 43
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Glock 19 and my Glock 43 with 1 mag loaded and an additional mag for each gun on the side. I normally don't have them loaded but I mention this in case anyone was wondering if you can. Love the app that comes with this one and battery has been charged just once when it got to 39% so it has lasted months without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Ed  H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gun safe
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint sensor doesn't always work, which is why I'm giving this 4 stars. But the code works like a charm and the safe itself is quite heavy duty. Save some money and buy the one without the fingerprint sensor, because the code will always work and that's what's most important if you need to access your gun(s) in a hurry. I haven't tried the Bluetooth option yet, and don't really see the need to. The battery has also held a full charge so far and it's been a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the safe, but Amazons "bundle" purchase is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this safe, and it's very nice. Works exactly as it's intended. However, under the main listing is where Amazon lists it's "buy all three" option. Included in that bundle, is the Smart Key Nano. I really liked the idea of a remote open option, so I got it as well. Unfortunately the Nano, while compatible with the larger VT series, is NOT compatible with the VT20 (which is called the 20 series). So now I have a Smart Key Nano, that is useless. Yes, I will send it back but it's not ideal to have to do that. Amazon should remove that item from the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love the features. Great item overall.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice unit. I noticed after a shower or swimming that the fingerprint does not work well. It’s pretty tight in space but I can fit my Kimber 1911 and 3 magazines, but that is pretty much it. It’s packed right.
customer_reviews.author: Nothingleft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Everything about it. The app is awesome. Battery life is awesome. Everything about this safe is awesome. I can tell when its been tampered with. This is absolutely the best affordable and mini safes on the market. Can't wait to get more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: good thing for amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered did not work. I sent it back and the replacement arrived quickly. It works pretty well. Keypad, key, and app work everytime. Biometric works most of the time. I need to play around with that part more. The app is nice and the Bluetooth has impressive range. The battery says 85% even though it has been plugged in for a week. When I hold in 5 it says it is fully charged. Who knows. The finish and quality are top notch though and I am happy with it. The light inside is bright and I do like the features.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Full of features and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vaultek brand for the visual appeal, the technology and “smart” features, and the reputation behind the brand. The features and functionality of the VT20i met my high expectations - however, be sure to check the size of your gun vs the interior space available. You may need a larger unit, such as the Vaultek VTi. If you size the safe appropriately for your gun, the VT20i won’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great unit it does the job well. I also like the fact I can take it with me in the car making it safe to transport what I need. The steel rope is very handy for locking things down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, fancy display works perfect, better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than I expected. The set up was easy the display is gorgeous. The box it came in is as luxurious as the safe itself, blows me away. The only issue is that I’m having problems with the fingerprint scanner not reading my fingerprint every time. I’m not sure If it’s how I set it up or what. If I can get that fixed it will be a five star review for sure.
customer_reviews.author: R8rmnaz

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what a lock box style gun 'safe' should do. It isn't fireproof or waterproof, but it is compact and light. It isn't tamper proof, but this style of safe is difficult to truly tamper proof. It keeps honest people honest and will prevent children/curious individuals out. Bio metrics works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this to anyone the biometric seldom ever works
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money. Very fast to access and very secure.
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe. From putting the battery in to programing was very simple and easy to do. Very secure and very fast to access items put into the safe. By far the best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jake 3

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader is wildly inconsistent and basically non-functional. If you are buying this safe for this feature you are wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, biometrics still a work in progress.....
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this safe - except for the biometrics. It is still not reliable despite their best efforts. So you just can't depend on the bio feature to access the safe quickly.
customer_reviews.author: georgiavol

customer_reviews.title: All around great product
customer_reviews.text: So far the safe works perfectly. There’s a few times you have to readjust you print but once you get the hang of taking your time with the print it works fine. The key pads are super responsive and will open just as fast as you can punch it in. I like how when your close to the pads they light up which is greatly needed in a night or low light environment. All in all it works for what I need it for and to keep my valuables secure.
customer_reviews.author: steven saldana

customer_reviews.title: This safe is built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: This safe is built like a tank. Before I buy most things I research other reviews and demos online. Everything was positive about this safe except for the two issues that have been addressed in the latest version. I am very confident in the safety and security of this safe. The biometerics work great.
customer_reviews.author: Texan Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Far Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived as promised and packaging was excellant. It was easy to setup and program. Much similar to program and use than previous Vehipa I returned because it would not program fingerprint, new security code or bluetooth never worked after several reset attempts. You can also see the quality of manufacturing and how sturdy it is compared to previous one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great safe for my Beretta 92 SF
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe for my Beretta 92 SF. fits nicely with just enough room for 2 clips. safe is well constructed and durable. The Biometric scanner works about 19 out of 20 scans and this could be due to finger placement. I did register the same finger multiple times from different angles to try and ensure the safe to open every time. entering the code works flawlessly and might even be faster than the Bio in an emergency situation. all in all this is a great safe and I feel really comfortable owning it.
customer_reviews.author: morbidjkr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice safe. Battery life seems pretty great. The fingerprint scanner doesn't always read on the first attempt, it could be a little more accurate. It was a little larger than I expected and does not fit under the seat of my car, although storage space and cushioning are excellent. An internal dimmer for the light would be nice, the app seems to work poorly with the device but is not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Key light up in red when your fingers touch the front for easy view of numbers
customer_reviews.text: High quality and well made for job of while-at-home-storage for safety. Key light up in red when your fingers touch the front for easy view of numbers, opens smooth, has tamper resistant improvements, lock cable is great touch for extra security (just lock it to a chain running through a 50lb bench press weight and no one is walking away with it while it's empty and your out). Bio is a little touchy. Upon product registration I emailed them and asked them to make it in America! (told them I would pay more). UPDATE ON BIO (3/20/18): Use your thumb if you can; takes up more of the pad indentation for first time, every time recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Verbum Sat

customer_reviews.title: Needs some tweaking but not bad
customer_reviews.text: The biometric feature doesn't always read reliably. It's easier and quicker to just punch in the code. The lid opens abruptly (and loudly) and causes the whole safe to jolt off the table. This is even with heavy handguns in it. There are only two screw holes to fasten the safe to a table or wall. If you use the locking cable, it uses one of the holes. One screw will probably not work over time to keep the safe from jolting off the table or if someone tried to move the safe. Overall it's a good idea but fixing those minor issues would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: very nice safe! works how it’s supposed too! the fingerprint reader is so cool and it opens fast and quietly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is what really surprised me. Great product that works very well. Biometrics can be hit or miss, but the fingerprint scanner works great for me (don't forget to slightly shift your finger/thumb when scanning to get best results). The packaging is terrific and the documentation for the safe and the app are excellent. Quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: wolfen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Don't bet your life on the fingerprint scanner...
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint scanner works MAYBE 20% of the time... if that. I've reset everything multiple times and reprogrammed my prints on multiple fingers from multiple angles... still an unacceptable failure rate for something that you need to access in an emergency. It's also very loud... you can forget stealth with this one. I really wanted to like it.. .but it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Clark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great safe had it for over a month works flawlessly. I was able to store 2 pistols in it.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW FREDERICK JR

customer_reviews.title: Best portable easy access firearm safe.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Holds my Glock 43 with extended mag and spare with ease. Easily accessible via Bluetooth, fingerscan, code, or key. Highly recommend for around the house or for travel to allow safe access to your firearm and keep away from those who shouldn’t have access.
customer_reviews.author: Blinders

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Update. Safe has been working great up till about a month ago. When I first got the safe the charge would last about 2 months. Now it wont completely charge up to 100% and the charge might last a week. 2 weeks if I dont access my firearm. Key works well if battery is dead but this is why a safe with electronics can be weak link. It certainly is with this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a real techy guy and was concerned about all the technical hoops that I might have to jump through to get this safe to operate for me ... the operating and programming directions were simple, straight forward and easy to follow and the vault responded to each and every procedure exactly as it was suppose to. Top quality piece of equipment that's easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for technology lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this VT20i vault to take on a trip and upgrade from another manufacturers old number pad only version. I love it! The finger print and Bluetooth features (with the phone app) are terrific!! The only thing I don't like is the limited number pad to input a 4 to 8 digit master code. No biggie. I will soon be purchasing an upgraded "Pro" version. There are more numbers (1-8) but I will miss not having the numbers 9 & 0, which I like to use in my codes......I not only use them for guns, I use them for special things when on trips.
customer_reviews.author: R. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: From the incredible packaging Great how to instructions The product is beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all around. From the incredible packaging Great how to instructions The product is beautiful and sturdy. Fingerprint scanner is surprisingly quick and the buttons are nice and "clicky". ( i have had a safe with rubber buttons with drove me up the wall)
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best gun safe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gun safe I have ever owned. After multiple angles and two different fingers I can always get the biometric scanner to open. Interior light is great at night. Feel secure for it to be around my family.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe for firearm storage. It is very well made. The fingerprint reader has never failed to open the safe. Having a touchpad code and key lock for backup is very nice although I have never had to use them. The LED light that comes on upon opening is a nice feature. I am highly recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I won't trust my life to the fingerprint lock. Can set a fingerprint, but can't get the vault to open using one. Used dry finger and wet finger, doesn't matter. I can open it three other ways, keypad, key lock and bluetooth, so I will keep it. This thing is heavy duty, no doubt. Best to bolt it down, cause when the door opens, it bounces the whole unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: Huge quality in a small safe!
customer_reviews.text: Very Impressive safe. I have been shopping for a few weeks now. I am more than satisfied with the quality, and the customer support. It's Amazing how many things you can do with tha app as well.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Best pistol safe out there
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pistol safe. Opens quickly and quietly. Great fingerprint recognition. I love that I can open it from my phone and check to see if anyone has attempted to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dimitriu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought 2 of this safe. To ensure the safety of our granddaughters when they are at our home was our reason for the purchase. This safe allows easy accessibility to my weapon if needed, plus 3 ways of entry... fingerprint, pin #, and key, also allowing more than one person to be able to access entry in the household. Everything we wanted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER HOLDS A CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in 2017 and it worked great till the end of 2018. Within 24 hours, the valut is completly dead after being fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for bedside safe
customer_reviews.text: This Is a very well-made safe. The number pad and phone app work very well to open it, but the one thing lacking is the fingerprint scanner is not very good. I have tried to program a fingerprint multiple times, and getting it to work is very infrequent.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service Dept.
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate Dustin with the Vaultek Safe, Inc customer service. We had a problem with the safe we purchased and I was promptly contacted and sent a new safe with a return label for the first one. As described the Safe works perfectly, finger prints, code and blue tooth with the smart phone. Very satisfied with the product and the customer service response. Keep up the good work Dustin. Rebecca
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vaultek VT20i Biometric Handgun Bluetooth Smart Safe Pistol Safe with Auto-Open Lid and Rechargeable Battery
feature_bullets: UPGRADED ANTI-THEFT PROTECTION features anti-pry bars, two point anti-impact latches, interior mounted hinges, and NEW interior security brackets for the ultimate prevention against break-ins. Available with the entire Vaultek product line up including the new VT10i.
TOUGH AND RUGGED heavy-duty 16-gauge carbon steel construction with a durable powdercoat finish preventing corrosion and ensures long lasting protection of your belongings for years to come.
QUICK ACCESS to your valuables, documents, and firearm(s) from the automatic opening door. Get in quick when it matters most using the rapid fire backlit keypad or biometric fingerprint scanner.

SMART SAFE TECHNOLOGY a highly interactive experience from your smartphone. You can easily toggled on/off using the available hotkeys if desired and still maintain all other safe functions. A RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM-ION battery provides power up to 4 months, and charges in 2.5 hours with the included micro-USB charging kit.
RESPONSIVE LED LIGHTING in low light situations so you can locate your safe with the backlit keypad and easily view your safe contents with an adjustable interior LED light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
